The class, it seemed, had run from the early 80s until the mid-90s, though every reference to it had been expunged from the Harvard databases and official histories. Ruth could find no syllabus, but there were a handful of materials available online, images and snippets of text hollowed out by their disconnect from the lecturer.

irst she found old slides, the type that were printed on wax paper for ease of projection.
